### C:
```{r}
ggplot(Flagstaff_Weather,
       aes(x=DATE, y = TMAX)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title= "Max Temperature in Flagstaff, AZ from 2015-2019" ) +
  labs(x="Date", y="Max Temp of the Day")
```
